column1: 2518,New X-Men (2004) #19,19,41665,41,"House of M Tie-In!  It's the New X-Mutants vs. Hellions, House of M style! The brawl to end all brawls erupts in Japan as the two schools go toe-to-toe. But hen the dust settles, will the victor have enough strength to take on Emperor Sunfire's entire army?",
